function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Early re-opening of businesses and termination of population isolation could lead to a Covid-19 rebound or seasonal re-emergence.","Impact":"Public trust may be further damaged, and economies may suffer more damage.","Mitigation":"Establish baselines for the incidence of Covid-19 before re-opening, and detect resurgence and acceleration.","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) for early detection of Covid-19.","People":"General population, businesses, government.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities."},{"Description":"WBE may detect Covid-19 before it is possible with random diagnostic testing, but the timing of virus shedding is uncertain.","Impact":"Uncertain early detection of Covid-19 may affect the effectiveness of WBE.","Mitigation":"Further study and research to understand the timing of virus shedding in stool.","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE), diagnostic testing.","People":"Public health authorities, researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Variability in the timing of shedding SARS-CoV-2 into stool and persistence of shedding after symptoms resolve poses challenges for WBE.","Impact":"Inaccurate detection of Covid-19 through WBE, leading to potential misinterpretation of data.","Mitigation":"More comprehensive data collection and studies on the variability of shedding in stool.","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE), data analytics.","People":"Public health authorities, research scientists.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities."}]}
